TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Label extends Xamarin.Forms.View implements class Xamarin.Forms.IElementConfiguration`1<class Xamarin.Forms.Label>, class Xamarin.Forms.Internals.IFontElement
type Label = class inherit View interface IFontElement interface IElementConfiguration<Label>

Docs.summary: A that displays text.

remarks.para: A Label is used to display single-line text elements as well as multi-line blocks of text.
The following example, adapted from the default Xamarin.Forms solution, shows a basic use:

example.para: The FormsGallery sample, which can be found on the Sample Applications page, has a LabelDemoPage.cs file. This file contains a longer and more complete example.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Font for the Label. This is a bindable property.
Docs.value: The value for the Label. The default is , which represents the default font on the platform.
